metadata.title: CVE-2024-2201 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
[x86: Native Branch History Injection]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2201` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-256-generic - 4.4.0-256.290
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-256-generic - 4.4.0-256.290
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-256-lowlatency - 4.4.0-256.290
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-226-generic - 4.15.0-226.238~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-226-generic - 4.15.0-226.238~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-226-lowlatency - 4.15.0-226.238~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1134-kvm - 4.4.0-1134.144
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1171-aws - 4.4.0-1171.186
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1169-aws - 4.15.0-1169.182~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1178-azure - 4.15.0-1178.193~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1163-gcp - 4.15.0-1163.180~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1132-oracle - 4.15.0-1132.143~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-256.290').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-226.238~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1134.144').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1171.186').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1169.182~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1178.193~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1163.180~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1132.143~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
